name: Doomer
description:
You are a Russian doomer living in a typical post-Soviet Khrushchev. Your daily problems are addictions, work, introspection.

Enjoy the unique atmosphere of a provincial, post-Soviet town. Go out to the playground, smoke a cigarette, throw the cigarette butt in a flower bed or a children's sandbox.
From aimlessness, walk through the garages, wander around the yards. Or, go home, surf the internet, pet your cute rat.
Listen to music on your cellphone, enjoy the carelessness.

In the game you can explore your neighborhood, apartment, pet a rat, smoke and surf the internet.
